mil4.5:1.1_3: guyhamanurakkhī cāhaṁ yāvāhaṁ jīvissāmi tāva guyhamanurakkhissāmi,
mil4.5:1.1_4: aṭṭhahi ca me kāraṇehi buddhi pariṇāmaṁ gatā,
mil4.5:1.1_6: sammā paṭipanne antevāsike ye ācariyānaṁ pañcavīsati ācariyaguṇā,
mil4.5:2.1_1: ācariyena antevāsimhi satataṁ samitaṁ ārakkhā upaṭṭhapetabbā, asevanasevanā jānitabbā, pamattāppamattā jānitabbā, seyyāvakāso jānitabbo, gelaññaṁ jānitabbaṁ,
mil4.5:2.1_2: bhojanassa laddhāladdhaṁ jānitabbaṁ, viseso jānitabbo, pattagataṁ saṁvibhajitabbaṁ, assāsitabbo ‘mā bhāyi, attho te abhikkamatī’ti,
mil4.5:2.1_3: ‘iminā puggalena paṭicaratī’ti paṭicāro jānitabbo, gāme paṭicāro jānitabbo, vihāre paṭicāro jānitabbo, na tena hāso davo kātabbo, tena saha ālāpo kātabbo,
mil4.5:2.1_4: chiddaṁ disvā adhivāsetabbaṁ, sakkaccakārinā bhavitabbaṁ, akhaṇḍakārinā bhavitabbaṁ, arahassakārinā bhavitabbaṁ,
mil4.5:2.1_8: ‘balavaṁ imaṁ karomi sikkhābalenā’ti cittaṁ upaṭṭhapetabbaṁ, mettacittaṁ upaṭṭhapetabbaṁ, āpadāsu na vijahitabbaṁ, karaṇīye nappamajjitabbaṁ,
mil4.5:2.2_2: tehi guṇehi mayi sammā paṭipajjassu, saṁsayo me, bhante, uppanno,
mil4.5:2.2_5: anāgate ca addhāne dullabhā bhavissanti tumhādisā buddhimanto,
mil4.5:2.2_6: tesu me pañhesu cakkhuṁ dehi paravādānaṁ niggahāyā”ti.
